feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 5 stages: D, R, I, V, E.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission describes and demonstrates a working financial application workflow: pulling earnings-report data, extracting key financial line items, and updating a spreadsheet (evidence above). Discover and Implement stages show both the problem framing and a functioning implementation, meeting the criterion that the tool performs financial tasks.
- Integrate AI: The student shows a concrete, repeatable AI-enabled workflow that extracts structured financial data from filings and populates a spreadsheet, and lists specific fields extracted, demonstrating clear value beyond superficial use. Given the moderate evaluation standard (conceptual implementation acceptable), this meets the threshold for effective AI integration.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "I figured out that I could use NAN to pull data. From companies earnings reports and then shoot it over to a Google sheet."
"A I will go through find the values and then it will add them to this Google sheet."
"And then you can see it updates this entire row of revenues, cash and cash equivalents, cost of goods sold, net income, property, plant, equipment, net."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover — student identified the user need: "it can get extremely tedious..." and the goal to automate extracting values from 10‑Q reports.  
Implement — student described concrete steps and demonstrated functionality: locating a 10‑Q, pasting the URL, AI extracting values, and appending rows to a Google Sheet.
criteria.reasoning: The submission describes and demonstrates a working financial application workflow: pulling earnings-report data, extracting key financial line items, and updating a spreadsheet (evidence above). Discover and Implement stages show both the problem framing and a functioning implementation, meeting the criterion that the tool performs financial tasks.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: ["I figured out that I could use NAN to pull data from companies earnings reports and then shoot it over to a Google sheet."]
["it will go through find the values and then it will add them to this Google sheet."]
["so it updates this entire row of revenues, cash and cash equivalents, cost of goods sold, net income, property, plant, equipment, net."]
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover — identified the user pain (tedious manual extraction) motivating an AI solution; Implement — describes the workflow where the system pulls 10‑Q data, uses AI to extract key values, and appends them to a Google Sheet.
criteria.reasoning: The student shows a concrete, repeatable AI-enabled workflow that extracts structured financial data from filings and populates a spreadsheet, and lists specific fields extracted, demonstrating clear value beyond superficial use. Given the moderate evaluation standard (conceptual implementation acceptable), this meets the threshold for effective AI integration.
